column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I had a good evening here for a special occasion. The service was good and efficient. Our server was very charming. My issue was with the food and atmosphere
column3: but was fairly boring with poorly executed elements of some dishes. Notably a weird peanut sauce that was not only not flavorful
column4: but also had the unappetizing consistency of grainy paste. Another green sauce (the piri piri I believe) also paste-like and grainy
column5: at least had a bit more flavor. Every other dish was predictable. Every combination felt like the obvious choice.
